text:
Hi Jacob,
I have the same problem. I've created a custom button and with the style fields I've given the horizontal alignment setting it to the center by default.
Then in a landing I needed the button but set to the left, so I did as you set horizontal_alignment="LEFT" and in fact the button went to the left as I wanted but I realized that, in page, I lose the settings of the alignment of my module. For example if in page I want to reset the alignment to the center, this does not move and remains on the left
Hi Giovanni, thanks for sharing your experience.
